title: Video Analysis-Based Teaching Coach Reflective Practice Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in teaching mathematics and possession of basic instructional coaching skills
context.additional_context: VR simulation recreating real classroom scenarios with BYOD-based learner participation

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate teaching practices by analyzing various types of lesson videos (lecture, peer, self-reflection)
Learners can generate three specific reflective feedbacks after observing peer teaching performances in VR simulation environments
Learners can create a self-assessment checklist based on their own lesson videos and develop at least two practical improvement plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
